page.title: 04A football fans Saturday
page.content: Saturday morning - 9.30am, I get up, wash, put on my casual clothes (no school uniform today) and have cereal, toast and tea while watching breakfast television. After breakfast I go out to meet my friends and we have a game of football or "tig". I'm back in the house at 12.00 for a snack lunch of soup and sandwiches, after which it's a four mile trip by bus to go and watch the local junior football team. At half time we visit the chip shop for something to eat. After the match we're home in time to see the football results on TV and then we have our dinner at 5.00pm. I watch my favourite television programme then it's off out again - this time to the Junior Disco. The disco finishes at 10.30pm, so it's off home to watch the late night football on TV, and one last programme before bed about midnight.
